headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Apple, Tesla, Nvidia, Boeing, DuPont, Intel, Nike, Affirm, and More
summary: Shares of Apple, Tesla, and Nvidia extend losses Friday after China says it will impose a 34% retaliatory tariff on all imported goods from the U.S.

headline: Dell Technologies (NYSE:DELL) Updates $897 Million Fixed-Income Offering After 18% Price Drop Last Month
summary: Dell Technologies (NYSE:DELL) recently announced changes in the lead underwriters for its $897 million fixed-income offering, a significant move amid its share price drop of 18% last month. The company's stock buyback update and advancements in AI infrastructure with partners like NVIDIA occurred during a period of market turmoil, highlighted by the Dow's 4% decline amid escalating global trade tensions. With the Nasdaq Composite entering bear market territory, Dell's share price faced...

headline: Intel, Dell, Chinese tech stocks fall: Market Minute
summary: As part of today's Market Minute, Madison Mills outlines the top stories of the trading day. Intel (INTC) stock plunges as US–China trade war tensions intensify. Dell Technologies (DELL) stock extends losses as Morgan Stanley (MS) analysts raise concerns about tariff impacts. Chinese tech stocks, like Alibaba (BABA), PDD Holdings (PDD), and JD.com (JD), tumble as China retaliates against Trump's new tariffs. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: These Stocks Are Moving the Most Today: Apple, Tesla, Nvidia, Boeing, Dell, Intel, Affirm, GameStop, and More
summary: Apple extends losses after shares of the iPhone maker lost $313.5 billion in market cap on Thursday after President Donald Trump announced tariffs on U.S. trading partners, while Tesla and Nvidia tumble after China says it will impose a 34% retaliatory tariff on all imported goods from the U.S.
